casebody.data:
BRUNS
v.
BRYANT, et al. 282P16-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Jenny Bruns, for Bruns, Jeremy, et al. Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas M. Woodward, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina, et al. John I. Malone, Jr., Attorney at Law, Brandon D. Zeller, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for USAA.

Jeremy Bruns

Philip H. Cheatwood, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Bryant, Dalton (Jr.).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2017 by Plaintiffs for Reconsideration of Denied Motion to Reject, Dismiss, and Strike Response to Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review by the Attorney General, Dismissing the Appeal as Moot, Dismissing the Notice of Appeal, and Denying Petition for Discretionary Review:

*394"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
